release.action: Moved to github. Changed coordinates to net.oneondone.pommes:maven and package accordingly.
Detect resolution problems when loading a pom.
Removed explicit proxy selector - loaded from settings instead.
Switch from Sonatype Aether to Eclipse Aether.
Cleanup api
Configurable user settings.
Configureable settings file.
Update wagon 1.0 to 2.6, plexus utils 2.0.7 to 3.0.8, and maven 3.0.4 to 3.0.5.
Align packages with groupId. Removed 3.3.0 release from Artifactory.
Maven object is always created from settings now; creation from defaults for urls has been removed because it's problematic for the artifactory switch.
Bumped version to 3.3.0 and changed groupId and packages to com.oneandone.sales.tools.maven (to comply with new naming scheme).
Update sushi 2.8.8 to 2.8.12.
Maven.withSettings did not configure authentication.
configurable profiles and properties in loadPom
Getter for Repository System and Session.
Fix deployment for files that do not fit into memory.
Update sushi 2.7.0 to 2.8.1.
Update parent to switch to java 7.
Add localRepository override parameter.
Fix repository policy when loading from settings.xml.
Update Sushi 2.6.1 to 2.7.0.
Support plugin metadata deployment.
Fix Maven.withSettings to respect MAVEN_OPTS with -Dmaven.repo.local.
Provides access to repositories.
Fix repository type when loading maven settings.
Instantiate Maven from settings.
Fix proxy configuration for repositories passed to Maven constructor.
Update Aether 1.12 to 1.13.
Dump all old code, which was Maven 2. Start new version based on pucwar resolver.
Maven.findWriteRepository generalized for arbitrary repository list and moved to Repository class.
Update dependencies.
Resolve parent poms when loading a pom.
Add pom interpolation.
Update Maven libraries to 2.2.1.
Switch to Sushi 2.0.2.
Moved protocol package to protocol plugin.
Simplify and updated dependencies.
Removed linkcheck code and the dependency to Mork.
Fix standard repo url from ext-central to ext-releases without snapshots.
Changed special value for billy.remote from "modern" to standard".
Resolve Task: do no access billy unless the linkcheck is used.
Distinguish modern and legacy repository configuration.
Fix Svn Node creation during protocol generation
Dump obsolete Pustemanager class
Turn io.node("resource:foo") info io.resource("foo")
Switch to Sushi 2.0.0 and Mork 0.6.0.
